channel.title: Text on other tabs
channel.description:
Ok,
I know how to change the text on the settings tab...
(changing emote text and the auto retailiate text)
but how would you change the text on the other tabs?
i know it is something like [code]sendQuest("texthere", <frame id>)[/code]
but how do you work out the frame ids?... does anyone have a list of something,
thanks,
~ toonshorty[br][size=1]Posted on: October 20, 2007, 03:47:19 PM[/size][hr]do you know what I mean?... like how do you find the <frame id> thing for the text?...
